name: A
description: The letter A in ASL

name: B
description: The letter B in ASL

name: Hello
description: Greeting someone

name: Thank You
description: Expressing gratitude

name: Friend
description: Referring to a friend

name: H
description: Point index and middle fingers to the side with thumb up

name: I
description: Raise pinky finger with other fingers curled into palm

name: J
description: Draw a 'J' shape in the air with your pinky finger

name: K
description: Raise index and middle fingers with thumb between them

name: L
description: Extend thumb and index finger to form an 'L' shape

name: M
description: Tuck thumb under three fingers with pinky extended

name: N
description: Tuck thumb under first two fingers with others extended

name: O
description: Form a circle with thumb and index finger touching

name: P
description: Extend index finger and thumb to form a 'P' shape

name: Q
description: Form a 'Q' shape with thumb and index finger pointing down

name: R
description: Cross middle finger over index finger

name: S
description: Make a fist with thumb over fingers

name: T
description: Place thumb between index and middle fingers

name: U
description: Extend index and middle fingers together upward

name: V
description: Extend index and middle fingers in a 'V' shape

name: W
description: Extend index, middle, and ring fingers upward

name: X
description: Bend index finger into a hook shape

name: Y
description: Extend thumb and pinky while keeping other fingers down

name: Z
description: Trace a 'Z' shape in the air with your index finger
